error.error_account: Your current account is disabled due to reset, You can use the latest backup files to restore account.
error.error_account_memo: Because your current account has been reset, you cannot view the comments before the reset

password.wrong_length: The password must contain at least 12 characters,a combination of numbers, special characters or letters.
password.wrong_confirm: The confirmation does not match the password

create_account.note_msg: Your password is not stored in the browser or in a central server,please ensure that you remember this password!
create_account.prompt_p1: Account Private Key owns the supreme authority, can be used for account recovery and password reset!
create_account.prompt_p2: Private key is NOT stored in the local wallet or browser. Please keep it safe as it cannot be recovered!
create_account.backed_up: I have already backup the Account Private Key

import_file.title: Account Restore
import_file.prompt: Please select your backup file in the dialog below. This is completely safe as the file is not uploaded anywhere and never leaves your browser.

restore_account.title: Account Reset
restore_account.prompt_p1: Store your Account Private Key！It can be used for account recovery and password reset！
restore_account.prompt_p2: Private key will be not stored in the local wallet or the browser
restore_account.prompt_p3: Store it using a password manager or by writing it down manually, you can NOT acquire it again once lost

erc20.title: Gateway
erc20.note: Conversion from ethereum ERC20 tokens to YOYOW mainnet tokens is now available. Click the “Generate” button, an ethereum address will be assigned automatically. Send your YOYOW token from your ERC20 compatible ethereum wallet to this address, the system will automatically transfer equivalent number of YOYO tokens to your YOYOW account.
erc20.transfer_out_note: Convert YOYOW mainnet tokens to ethereum ERC20 tokens. The conversion will be processed automatically within one minute. Usually it will take a few minutes to reach your ethereum address.
erc20.confirm_note: ERC20 Gateway fees will be charged from the amount transferred. Please make sure the amount is greater than %(amount)s.
erc20.alert_input_amount: Please enter the amount of transfers
erc20.alert_valid_amount: The amount of transfers must be greater than %(amount)s %(unit)s
erc20.error_balance: The balance is not sufficient to cover the entire operating costs

bts.title: Gateway
bts.note: To transfer YOYO from BTS DEX to yoyow.gateway (ID#402807), please indicate "yoyow#your mainnet account number" (without the quotation marks) in the memo. Mainnet YOYO tokens will be deposited to your account automatically. It is recommended to test with a small amount first.  Example:
bts.transfer_out_note: The gateway will automatically withdraw. The withdraw arrival time will depend on the confirmation speed of BTS, about less than 1 min.
bts.confirm_note: Gateway fees will be charged from the amount transferred. Please make sure the amount is greater than %(amount)s.
bts.alert_input_amount: Please enter the amount of transfers
bts.alert_valid_amount: The amount of transfers must be greater than %(amount)s %(unit)s
bts.error_balance: The balance is not sufficient to cover the entire operating costs

balance.alert_balance_not_enough: Exceed maximum avilable amount of Balance
balance.alert_prepaid_not_enough: Exceeds maximum avilable amount of Tipping Account
balance.alert_balance_cant_pay: Exceed maximum avilable amount of Balance
balance.alert_prepaid_cant_pay: Exceeds maximum avilable amount of Tipping Account
balance.alert_casf_invalid_amount: Credits amount must be more than 0
balance.alert_csaf_balance_cant_pay: Balance NOT enough to pay the fee
balance.alert_casf_prepaid_cant_pay: The Tipping Account NOT enough to pay the fee
balance.alert_csaf_not_enough: Credits to be collected NOT enough
balance.error_head_time: The operation does not match the time on the chain

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.alert_other_to_account: Current account can NOT be destination
transfer.alert_balance_not_enough: Exceed maximum avilable amount of Balance
transfer.alert_prepaid_not_enough: Exceeds maximum avilable amount of Tipping Account
transfer.alert_balance_cant_pay: Exceed maximum avilable amount of Balance
transfer.alert_prepaid_cant_pay: Exceed maximum avilable amount of Tipping Account

contacts.title: Contact
contacts.placeholder_filter_account: Filter by YOYOW ID or Remark

op_transfer.inner_transfer_from_balance: Transfer %(amount)s from balance to Tipping account
op_transfer.inner_transfer_from_prepaid: Transfer %(amount)s from Tipping account to balance

view_purview.title: Overview
view_purview.generate_QR_info: For protecting your private keys. The 6-digit PWD is required when scanning the two-dimensional code
view_purview.pwd_tips_Num_only: The password can only be a number
view_purview.pwd_tips_length_only: The password can only be 6 digits

master_key.title: Owner Key
master_key.info: Owner key, only can manage other permissions of the account

capital_key.title: Active key
capital_key.info: Active key, can control transfer and manage secondary permissions

secondary_key.title: Secondary key
secondary_key.info: Secondary key, authorize to media platform operation or tipping account

memo_key.title: Memo key
memo_key.info: Memo key ,can view the transaction memo

wallet_pwd.title: Tipping account password, which default is account password, required when transfer from Tipping Account. Setting a separate one can reduce the risk.

current_wallet_pwd.name: Current password
current_wallet_pwd.placeholder_value: Please enter the Tipping Account password

tips.title: Tips
tips.content: Account password can not be retrieved, only can be reset by importing private keys
tips.error_message_new: The password must contain at least 12 characters,a combination of numbers, special characters or letters.
tips.error_message_bool: The confirmation does not match the password

backup_account.title: Backup
backup_account.tips_content: Clicking on the button below will generate a backup file with a .bin extension.The file is encrypted using your account password, and can be used to recover your account or migrate your account between different browsers/computers.The backup file does not contain the owner authorization private key for the account

account_backup.label: Select account backup file, restore account

private_key_backup.label_1: Enter the account key and reset the account number. After resetting the account, the original backup file will be invalid, and other clients (PC wallet or APP wallet) of the account will also be invalid，
private_key_backup.label_3: If other client accounts are invalid, the latest backup files can be created here to recover.

init_error.title: Can not connect to API server
init_error.tips_time: Please make sure your computer system clock is correct
init_error.tips_API: After synchronizing your computer clock, please refresh this page. If your clock is correct, then you connect the API server may not be synchronized with the block chain data, in which case you can try to use other API server to connect.

authorize_service.title: Authorize sign in
authorize_service.note_msg: You will be authorized to log in to the [%(platform)s] platform
authorize_service.auth_option_forward: Allow platform to forward articles and change forward price on your behalf
authorize_service.auth_option_score: Allow platform to like or score articles on your behalf
authorize_service.auth_option_buyout: Allow platform to buyout articles' revenue and sell on your behalf
authorize_service.auth_option_comment: Allow platform to comment on other articles on your behalf
authorize_service.auth_option_reward: Allow platform to reward other articles on your behalf
authorize_service.auth_option_transfer: Allow platform to make transfers of your tipping
authorize_service.auth_option_post: Allow platform to publish articles on your behalf
authorize_service.auth_option_update: Allow platform to update articles' content on your behalf

Vote.to_proxy: You entrust %(value)s as your voting proxy.
Vote.erroMsg_black: You have been blacklisted and can not set up a voting proxy！
Vote.erroMsg_qualifications: You do not have the voting qualifications, can not set the voting proxy!
Vote.erroMsg_balance_proxy: Your YOYO balance less than %(value)s, can not set the voting proxy!
Vote.erroMsg_balance_vote: Your YOYO balance is less than %(value)s, can not vote!
Vote.erroMsg_notEnoughBalance: After deducting the fee, your balance is less than %(value)s, your YOYO balance is not enough!
Vote.erroMsg_target_uid: You enter the user does not exist, please enter the correct YOYOW number!
Vote.erroMsg_target_uid_qualifications: You enter the user does not have the voting qualifications, please re-enter!
Vote.active_vote: You activate the proxy qualifications as a proxy for other YOYOW users, to confirm activation?
Vote.ref_proxy: You can refresh the qualification of the proxy in order to extend the expiration time, confirm the refresh?
Vote.ref_vote: You can refresh the voting period, in order to extend the expiration time, confirm the refresh?

vote_ctr.votes_w_info: This vote a total of %(value)s votes
vote_ctr.votes_c_info: The number of candidates for this poll is %(value)s
vote_ctr.confirmVoteForNumber: Are you sure that %(value)s witnesses vote?
vote_ctr.confirmCancelForNumber: Are you sure that you cancel the vote for %(value)s witnesses?
vote_ctr.confirmVote: Are you sure to vote for candidate %(value)s?
vote_ctr.confirmCancel: Are you sure that the candidate who canceled %(value)s votes?
vote_ctr.confirmSelectMinVote: Your vote did not make any changes, please select again!
vote_ctr.bugTips: 5 account is a system account, temporarily do not provide 5 account and 9 account at the same time choose to vote
vote_ctr.vote_tips: You can refresh the expiration date or change the vote

proxy_ctr.proxy_success_add: You have successfully set up %(value)s three users for your voting proxy!
proxy_ctr.proxy_success_remove: You have removed your voting proxy
proxy_ctr.erroMsg_target_uid_self: Can not set myself as an proxy, please re-enter!
proxy_ctr.erroMsg_proxy_is_trustee: Can not set myself as an agent, please re-enter!
proxy_ctr.erromsg_notEnough_fees: Set proxy fee %(value)s, your YOYO balance is not enough!
proxy_ctr.confirm_proxy: You have a vote in progress, set the agent, your vote will be invalid, you confirm the establishment of voting agents?
proxy_ctr.confirm_remove_proxy: After removing an agent,%(value)s will lose the right to vote on your behalf, confirm removal?
